# Custom Workspace Instructions

1. This is new development, there are no external clients.
2. There is no legacy and no need to maintain backward compatibility once new code is proven stable.
3. Focus on clarity and simplicity in the code.
4. Maintain the ability to run this application from opening index.html in a browser.
5. Ensure that all dependencies are included locally or via CDN to support running from a local file.
6. Avoid using server-side code or features that require a server to run.
